choices.text:
### System:
You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can.

### User:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for seven days.  My restrictions are dairy, milk-based yogurt, garlic, honey, almonds, almond butter, pistachios, and cashews

### Response:


Sure! Here is a healthy meal plan for you for seven days. 

Day 1: Breakfast - Oatmeal with berries and nuts (without almonds or pistachios) Lunch - Grilled chicken salad with avocado, tomatoes, cucumber, and a vinaigrette dressing Dinner - Baked salmon with roasted vegetables

Day 2: Breakfast - Scrambled eggs with spinach and mushrooms Lunch - Tuna salad with mixed greens and cherry tomatoes Dinner - Grilled tofu with stir-fried vegetables

Day 3: Breakfast - Greek yogurt with berries and nuts (without almonds or pistachios) Lunch - Chicken Caesar salad with croutons Dinner - Baked sweet potato with roasted Brussels sprouts

Day 4: Breakfast - Overnight oats with mixed fruit and nuts (without almond butter or honey) Lunch - Grilled chicken sandwich on whole wheat bread with lettuce, tomatoes, and mustard Dinner - Quinoa bowl with roasted vegetables

Day 5: Breakfast - Scrambled eggs with spinach and mushrooms Lunch - Tuna salad with mixed greens and cherry tomatoes Dinner - Grilled tofu with stir-fried vegetables

Day 6: Breakfast - Greek yogurt with berries and nuts (without almonds or pistachios) Lunch - Chicken Caesar salad with croutons Dinner - Baked sweet potato with roasted Brussels sprouts

Day 7: Breakfast - Overnight oats with mixed fruit and nuts (without almond butter or honey) Lunch - Grilled chicken sandwich on whole wheat bread with lettuce, tomatoes, and mustard Dinner - Quinoa bowl with roasted vegetables

I hope this meal plan helps you! Let me know if there is anything else I can assist you with.
